title: My tabs did not reopen - history grayed out
content:
How do I restore my lost tabs when the history has the previous tabs grayed out?

Settings was marked to restore previous tabs.
creator: cspirit

title: Browser cannot find local HTML files
content: I recently installed Firefox version 133.0 on my Linux computer (Zorin distro). I intended to make one of my HTML files my homepage and it gives me a File Not Found error message. Then I tried to open another HTML file and the same thing happened. How do I correct this?
creator: swbvb

title: Stopping a Tab I Don't Need
content: How do I get the new popup screen "What's New With Firefox" to go away? I've already downloaded the latest version.
creator: tsandilla
